text: Yaad karo jab Moosa ( yeh niyamat lete huey palta, to us) ne apni qaum se kaha ke “logon, tumne bachde ko mabood bana kar apne upar sakht zulm kiya hai, lihaza tum log apne khaliq ke huzoor tauba karo aur apni jaano ko halaak karo, isi mein tumhare khaliq ke nazdeek tumhari behtari hai” us waqt tumhare khaliq ne tumhari tauba qabool karli ke woh bada maaf karne wala aur reham farmane wala hai
